Control Statement: The organization: a. Defines acceptable and unacceptable mobile code and mobile code technologies;b. Establishes usage restrictions and implementation guidance for acceptable mobile code and mobile code technologies; andc. Authorizes, monitors, and controls the use of mobile code within the information system.
